Recent Corams Steak&Eggs Reviews A diner [Marmaduke_3227@live.com] from Tyndall afb, Florida gave an overall rating of on July 27, 2010 @ 4:02 AM
This place is awesome food even better service wether me and my buddies show up drunk or sober the people there are always pleasant. Nothin to complain bout here. A diner from Panama City, FL gave an overall rating of on August 22, 2009 @ 11:20 AM
It's nice to still eat at an old fashioned diner. The food is excellent as well as the price. No matter what time you dine they are open 24/7. Very nice staff and quick service. I could eat there every day, but I think my wife would get a little jealous! » Read More Corams Steak&Eggs Reviews

Reviews of Similar Restaurants Captains Table American, Comfort Food/Home Cooking, Seafood, Steak House Great food. Have returned for past several years. Always leave satisfied. If you want good seafood eat here. I return to P.C. Beach each year and know I will get good food and service. Captains Table American, Comfort Food/Home Cooking, Seafood, Steak House A great local place with excellent food and service. The people are very friendly and make you feel like you have been coming forever. Ambience is local flavor with no frills. I will definitely be back. Captains Table American, Comfort Food/Home Cooking, Seafood, Steak House Best seafood ever...period. Even the slaw is great and I usually hate slaw! The bartender's the best. Rustlers Reef Restaurant&Lng American, Comfort Food/Home Cooking, Seafood, Steak House The very best place in Panama City for $1.99 dz oysters and the best steak. Ate here twice on vacation after trying the beach diners. Captains Table American, Comfort Food/Home Cooking, Seafood, Steak House If you want excellent, fresh seafood at good prices, without goofy frills or pretense, this is the place. It's a 30 minute drive from our condo in Panama City Beach, but well worth the drive. Where else can you get 2 dozen raw oysters and a pitcher
